sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CleanTemplateInputName</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Clean template variable names. This script (despite its name) is used for cleaning template input AND output variable names.</description>
        <name>CleanTemplateInputName</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CleanTemplateInputName = Class.create();
CleanTemplateInputName.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    type: 'CleanTemplateInputName',
	createCleanName: function() {
		var label = this.getParameter("sysparm_label");
		var templateAPI = new sn_templates.TemplateScriptableAPI();
		var cleanVarName = templateAPI.generateCleanFlowVariableName(label);
		return cleanVarName;
	}
});
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-02-17 22:18:06</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>b1db07470f1220108c9c5019c4767e78</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CleanTemplateInputName</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Application Templates" source="com.snc.apps_templates">1c2afca83cf1311068bcf327dfe37fff</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b1db07470f1220108c9c5019c4767e78</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-05-19 18:53:11</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
